meanings.definition: Of or relating to a comet.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the cometary tail of the comet.
meanings.sent2: The sky was filled with cometary dust from the passing comet.
meanings.sent3: The cometary glow in the night sky was like a celestial dance.
meanings.sent4: Her cometary hair trailed behind her like a shimmering comet.
meanings.sent5: The cometary beauty of the night sky left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a comet.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a cometary appearance with its swirling frosting.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a cometary scene with bright streaks across the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The cometary costume at the party was a hit among the guests.
meanings.sent4: His cometary speed on the track made him a star athlete.
meanings.sent5: The cometary fireworks lit up the sky in a dazzling display.
